articles.title: DPRK-Singapore Inter-Governmental Agreement Inked
articles.content:
DPRK-Singapore Inter-Governmental Agreement Inked
Pyongyang, December 3 (KCNA) -- An agreement on promoting and protecting investment between the governments of the DPRK and Singapore was signed in Singapore on Nov. 2.
					 Present at the signing ceremony from the DPRK side were members of the DPRK government economic delegation headed by Minister of Foreign Trade Ri Ryong Nam on a visit to Singapore and the DPRK ambassador to that country and from the Singaporean side Minister of Trade and Industry Lim Hng Kiang and officials concerned.
					
					 The agreement was inked by Ri and Lim.
					
					 That day an agreement on the bilateral cooperation between the Chamber of Commerce of the DPRK and the Singaporean Business Federation was signed.

articles.title: Sungnyung, Effective Koryo Medicine, Produced
articles.content:
Sungnyung, Effective Koryo Medicine, Produced
Pyongyang, December 3 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Maternity Hospital has recently made sungnyung, a Koryo medicine, which helps toward the treatment of patients and promotion of the health of working people. 
					The chief ingredient of this health drink is Koryo medicine and it proves effective against oxidation, cancer, inflammation, etc. and good for increasing vigor and vitality and treating women's diseases.
					
					 Containing peculiar ingredients protecting liver and heart, it facilitates digestion and proves highly effective in the treatment of disorders of the urinary organ, the liver, the heart and so on, if one drinks it for a certain period.
					
					 It is called sungnyung medicine as it is so prepared as to taste like sungnyung (scorched-rice tea), a favorite drink of the Koreans from olden times.     
					
					 This drink can be produced in large quantities as it is made with materials of Koryo medicine abundant in the country. It is popular with the users as it tastes like sweet and fragrant sungnyung and is highly effective medically.

articles.title: Korean Dancing Technique Strong in National Coloring
articles.content:
Korean Dancing Technique Strong in National Coloring
Pyongyang, December 3 (KCNA) -- The Korean dancing technique is the dance representation method peculiar to the nation, which was created in such a manner as to suit the people's constitution, aesthetic sense, ideological sentiment and living custom.
					Pliant and elegant is the dancing with movements of arms as the main, properly combined with leg movements.
					
					As for the dance of Ancient Korea which spread to neighboring countries, an old document wrote that the dance was to dance in a slow, soft and emotional way to an emotional music.
					
					The dancing technique assumed pronounced national characteristics in behavior and movement in the period of the three kingdoms (Koguryo, Paekje and Silla).
					
					The long sleeve clothes dance drawn on tomb murals belonging to Koguryo shows that two arms are protruding forward or sideward and sleeves hanging down.
					
					This bespeaks that the long sleeve clothes dance of Koguryo was to dance with arms moving slowly to the tune of an emotional music.
					
					Many dance pieces were disseminated to neighboring countries in the course of external exchange in the period of Palhae and Later Silla. The dances were called "Koryo dance (Palhae dance)", "Silla dance" and so on.
					
					In the period of Koryo which unified the territory, the Korean dancing technique further developed on the basis of the blood and cultural commonness of a homogeneous nation. The national dancing technique progressed in a uniform way in the years of Koryo which inherited the dances of the three kingdoms.
					
					During the Ri Dynasty, the royal dances, to say nothing of the folk dances created among the working people, were represented in the Korean dancing technique strong in national coloring.

articles.title: Japan's Bid for Permanent Membership of UNSC Ridiculed
articles.content:
Japan's Bid for Permanent Membership of UNSC Ridiculed 
 Pyongyang, December 3 (KCNA) -- A Japanese delegate, addressing the recent plenary meeting of the 63rd UN General Assembly, tediously explained the "legitimate right" of Japan to become a permanent member of the  UNSC during the discussion on its report and reform in a desperate bid to hold a responsible post at the UN. This impertinent behavior of Japan comes under fire by a signed commentary of Rodong Sinmun Wednesday. 
					 The commentary says: 
					
					 Japan has neither face nor qualification to make a bid for permanent membership of the UNSC nor is it in a position to sit there. 
					
					 Japan has not yet honestly reflected on nor made any proper reparation for the hideous crimes it committed against humanity in the past.
					
					 Those who negate their crime-woven history and tamper with it can never turn over a new leaf nor carve out future. They are bound to repeat their past crimes. It is quite impossible for such forces to perform any responsible role in the international community. 
					
					 It is impudent and disgraceful behavior and insult and mockery of justice and human conscience for Japan to claim what it called "legitimate right", making a desperate bid for such membership, unaware of its own deplorable position and the mind-set of the world.
					
					  One cannot sit on the UNSC no matter how earnestly he may desire it and, moreover, this post is by no means buyable. 
					
					 Japan would be well advised to shake off the ill-fame of being an enemy state and get trust from the world community by redressing its crime-woven past before impertinently eyeing a responsible post of the UN with an axe to grind. This should be done by Japan before anything else. Without doing so, Japan cannot escape the cool treatment and rebuff of the international public and its wish to sit on the UNSC will always remain a mere daydream.

articles.title: Humiliating Diplomacy of Lee Myung Bak Group Slammed
articles.content:
Humiliating Diplomacy of Lee Myung Bak Group Slammed
Pyongyang, December 3 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the Lee Myung Bak group accepted the robber-like demand made by the U.S. side at the negotiations held over the issue of "defense expenses sharing." This humiliating and treacherous behavior diametrically runs counter to the will and wishes of the south Korean people and the interests of the Korean nation.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes this in a signed commentary. 
					
					  It goes on:
					
					 Traitor Lee unhesitatingly accepted the U.S. side's demand for increasing south Korea's "share of defense expenses". This was designed to win his master's favor, stay in power by clinging to his coattails and execute its policy of confrontation and war towards the DPRK. 
					
					 The Lee group's decision to offer a stupendous amount of funds as the upkeep of the U.S. aggressor forces is a disgraceful act of treachery that left another blot on the history of the nation, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 Moreover, Lee's agreement on shouldering the additional financial burden for the upkeep of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces, the root cause of a war, is little short of putting spurs to the war chariot of foreign forces and bringing a nuclear disaster to all Koreans.  This act of treachery is unpardonable as it is a revelation of a sinister intention to spend money collected from the people as taxes as expenses for the war to be started by foreign forces and tighten the nexus for aggression against fellow countrymen. 
					
					 Reality clearly proves that it is impossible to realize the south Korean people's dream of a new society free from foreign forces and the compatriots' desire for the peaceful reunification of the country as long as the Lee group is allowed to sell off the dignity and interests of the nation and do harm to the destiny of the compatriots clinging to the sleeves of foreign forces.
					
					 Lee has committed so many crimes, staking his fate on the cooperation with foreign forces in utter disregard of the destiny of the country and the nation. He will have to pay a dear price for his sycophancy towards the U.S. and acts of treachery.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's "Policy towards North" Rebuked
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's "Policy towards North" Rebuked
 Pyongyang, December 3 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group added to the "policy towards the north" such watchwords as "co-existence and co-prosperity" but its treacherous and anti-reunification nature can never be changed, says Minju Joson today in a signed commentary.
					 The group sponsored a seminar under the signboard of "co-existence and co-prosperity", which is nothing but a crafty trick to beautify the "policy towards the north" criticized at home and abroad and mislead the internal and external opinions and thus justify the confrontation moves against the DPRK, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 If the U.S. and the south Korean rulers in league with each other had not turned south Korea into the largest nuclear advance base ever in the world and escalated the nuclear war exercises against the DPRK, the nuclear issue would not have come up at all in the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Therefore, it is a prerequisite to the denuclearization of the peninsula for the U.S. to make a switchover in its hostile policy towards the DPRK and for the south Korean puppets to discard the policy of confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 The said seminar, "addressed" by those anti-reunification and confrontation maniacs hostile towards the fellow countrymen, goes to prove that the Lee Myung Bak group is insisting on the "policy towards the north" aimed at confrontation between fellow countrymen in a bid to further aggravate the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 But, the south Korean puppets' moves to further bedevil the north-south relations will bring more stern punishment by the nation. Mindful of this, the Lee Myung Bak group should stop such shabby deed as veiling the filth with silk wrapper and make a switchover in its "policy towards the north".
					
					 Improvement of the inter-Korean relations entirely depends upon whether the Lee group will change its policy or not. The entire nation is closely watching the action of Lee Myung Bak.

articles.title: No Fortress Unconquerable for Korean People
articles.content:
No Fortress Unconquerable for Korean People
Pyongyang, December 3 (KCNA) -- Believing in people as in Heaven serves as a fundamental idea of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) in the nation-building, a basis of all its line and policies and a starting point of state activities.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The DPRK advancing under the leadership of the great Party regards the popular masses as the most valuable and mighty beings in the world, deems it as a fundamental principle governing the state activities to faithfully serve the people and solves all the issues arising in socialist construction in reliance on the popular masses.
					
					 The country, the army and the security organ and monumental edifices and various honorable titles in the DPRK go by the word of people. This clearly proves how dear the DPRK holds the people.
					
					 The DPRK lays down any line and policy, placing the people's interests above anything else, and builds any structure in such a manner as to enable the people to substantially benefit from it.
					
					 The people in the country are given an ample opportunity of learning, keeping themselves in good health and leading a cultural and emotional life full of revolutionary spirit and optimism thanks to the systems of free education and free medical care and various popular policies enforced by the state.
					
					 The WPK built the DPRK's indestructible ideological position by achieving single-minded unity with the popular masses, consolidated the invulnerable military position by dint of the mental power of all the servicepersons and people and reinforced the economic and cultural positions by enlisting the inexhaustible strength of the popular masses.
					
					 The Korean people have performed epoch-making miracles in every period of the revolution and construction and at their each phase true to the leadership of the Party and the leaders up to this date when they are building a great prosperous powerful socialist nation since the period of laying the foundation for founding the state and the early period of nation-building. They are highly proud of this.
					
					 They have grown strong enough to successfully undertake any difficult task for building a great prosperous powerful socialist nation under the care of the great Party. There are neither difficulties insurmountable nor fortress unconquerable for them as long as they remain united as firm as a rock around the great Party.

articles.title: All Koreans Called upon to Achieve Great National Unity
articles.content:
All Koreans Called upon to Achieve Great National Unity
Pyongyang, December 3 (KCNA) -- All Koreans in the north and the south and overseas should firmly unite as one irrespective of ideology and ism in order to achieve the reunification of the country as early as possible as required by the June 15 era of reunification and their desire.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says this in a signed article. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The issue of great national unity presents itself as a quite natural and essential requirement of the movement for national reunification, a movement for reunifying the Korean nation divided by outside forces.
					
					 The development of this movement would be unthinkable without the great national unity as it is a basic precondition for independent and peaceful reunification and its essential element.
					
					 The cause of national reunification is a nationwide cause of independence as it can be achieved only through the concerted efforts of the Koreans.
					
					 It is possible to successfully achieve the reunification of the country only when all Koreans unite close as one under the banner of the great national unity as a driving force for national reunification and increase it in every way.
					
					 The wisdom, will and energy of all Koreans united as one serve as an engine for developing the movement for national reunification. They can dynamically advance the above-mentioned movement, foiling the vicious anti-reunification moves of the separatist forces at home and abroad only when they place the interests common to the nation above all, pushing aside the differing ideology, ism and system, and go united on this basis.
					
					 The stirring reality of the June 15 era of reunification making a dynamic advance under the banner of "By our nation itself" clearly proves that no one can overpower the concerted efforts of the Koreans and these efforts serve as an engine propelling the movement for national reunification.
					
					 The nation's process for achieving reconciliation and unity is undergoing a trial due to the traitorous and anti-reunification moves of the above-said separatist forces.
					
					 This grave situation more urgently calls for regarding great national unity as an important task of the movement for national reunification and thoroughly implementing it than ever before.
					
					 Nothing can match the might of the united nation and irresistible is the progress of the nationwide movement for national reunification advancing in firm unity under the banner of national independence and patriotism.

articles.title: Abolition of NSL Demanded in South Korea
articles.content:
Abolition of NSL Demanded in South Korea
Pyongyang, December 3 (KCNA) -- A press conference was held on Dec. 1 under the sponsorship of the People's Solidarity for Abolition of the "National Security Law"(NSL) 60 years after it was fabricated in south Korea.
					A declaration demanding the abolition of the NSL signed by at least 4,700 personages of all strata was made public there.
					
					 The declaration termed the past six decades when the NSL has been in force an era of barbarians in which human conscience, freedom and democratic rights have been mercilessly violated. 
					
					 There goes on a tragedy in which to have an idea similar to the assertion of the north, no matter how right it is, is liable to imprisonment, the declaration deplored, stressing that social democracy is hardly attainable as long as the NSL remains in force to suppress even the freedom of thinking and expression.
					
					 It was by the force of this evil law that neither progressive party nor progressive movement could be free from suppression in south Korea and it has been dominated by a social and economic structure and a political system for a handful of classes and strata, the declaration held. 
					
					 It accused the Lee Myung Bak "government" of refusing to modify the NSL even a bit and mulling a new security rule to be enforced with priority given to the evil law though the nation lives in the June 15 era of reunification.
					
					 The reunification and peace on the Korean Peninsula are unthinkable as long as the NSL remains in force, it noted. 
					
					 Speakers at the press conference declared that to have the NSL repealed is the only way of achieving social democracy and reunification.
					
					 They declared that they would never forgive the crimes committed by the "government" of Lee Myung Bak, a descendant of the dictators who cooked up the NSL, and "the Grand National Party" but fight to the last moments of their lives to get it abolished.

articles.title: Kim Jong Suk's Birth Anniversary Commemorated in Mexico
articles.content:
Kim Jong Suk's Birth Anniversary Commemorated in Mexico
Pyongyang, December 3 (KCNA) -- The Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism issued its bulletin No.15 with a portrait of Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese war hero, carried on it on the occasion of the 91st anniversary of her birth. 
					 The bulletin in an article said that Kim Jong Suk was an ardent revolutionary who dedicated her all to the Workers' Party of Korea and the leader, the liberation of the country and the victory of the revolution. 
					
					 She performed immortal exploits to shine long in history by impersonating the great revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung and the revolutionary spirit of Mt. Paektu on the highest level and embodying them, the bulletin noted.
					
					 It recalled that she gave birth to General Secretary Kim Jong Il, the sun of the future, thus providing a steady continuity to the revolutionary cause of Juche pioneered by the President and enabling the Korean people to enjoy the highest honor and happiness of being blessed with the illustrious leaders generation after generation. 
					
					 Kim Jong Suk is always alive in the hearts of the Korean people as a lifeguard of the President, anti-Japanese war hero, outstanding politician and great revolutionary mother for her noble ideological and moral trait and the immortal revolutionary exploits performed for the country and the people, it said, adding: Her august name is brilliantly shining as one of the three great persons and one of the three generals in the modern history of Korea.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Anti-DPRK Moves Blasted
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Anti-DPRK Moves Blasted
Pyongyang, December 3 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on Nov. 20 to accuse the Lee Myung Bak group of its anti-DPRK confrontation moves and fascist crackdown upon the south Korean people's struggle.
					 The statement expressed apprehension over the fact that the Lee group is systematically bedeviling the inter-Korean relations and driving the situation to confrontation while denying the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 Charging that traitor Lee Myung Bak is staging undisguised campaign against the DPRK even in the international arena, the statement branded such action as a vicious insult to the DPRK and climax of hypocrisy.
					
					 Bitterly condemning the traitor's deeds, it demanded the immediate abolition of the "National Security Law", an unpopular evil law, and democratization of the south Korean society.
					
					 The statement expressed full support for the Anti-imperialist National Democratic Front and the revolutionaries and all democratic and patriotic forces of south Korea in their just struggle against traitor Lee Myung Bak and for democracy and independent reunification.

articles.title: Firmado convenio entre RPDC y Singapur
articles.content:
Firmado convenio entre RPDC y Singapur
Pyongyang, 3 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Quedo suscrito el dia 2 en Singapur el convenio sobre la promocion y proteccion de las inversiones entre los gobiernos de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y de la Republica de Singapur.
					En la ceremonia de firmas participaron por la parte coreana los miembros de la delegacion economica gubernamental de la RPDC presidida por el ministro de Comercio Exterior, Ri Ryong Nam, y el embajador coreano en ese pais, y por la singapurense, el ministro de Comercio e Industria Lim Hng Kiang y otros funcionarios correspondientes.
					
					Ri Ryong Nam y Lim Hng Kiang rubricaron el documento.
					
					El mismo dia, fue rubricado el acuerdo sobre la cooperacion mutua entre la Camara de Comercio de la RPDC y la Federacion de Negocios de Singapur.

articles.title: Sungnyung -medicina tradicional de Corea
articles.content:
Sungnyung -medicina tradicional de Corea
Pyongyang, 3 de diciembre (ATCC) --Recientemente, en la Casa de Maternidad de Pyongyang hicieron el Sungnyung (agua de arroz tostado) - medicina tradicional de Corea para el tratamiento de enfermas y el fomento de la salud de los trabajadores.
					  El elemento principal de esta agua es la medicina tradicional de Corea y tiene varios efectos como las funciones resistentes al acido, cancer e inflamacion. Ademas, es favorable para el mantenimiento del cuerpo robusto y es eficaz para el tratamiento de enfermedad ginecologica.
					
					  Tiene elementos especiales para la proteccion de higado y corazon, gracias a lo cual surte gran eficacia en el tratamiento de la indigestion y las enfermedades del organo urinario,  higado, corazon, etc.
					
					  Este material medicinal se llama el Sungnyung  medicinal por haber adjuntado nueva receta medicinal que da el sabor de Sungnyung, bebida nacional que el pueblo coreano ha venido tomando desde la antiguedad.
					
					  Nueva bebida medicinal la pueden hacer sin restriccion de materias primas porque nuestro pais tiene abundantes materiales de medicina tradicional de Corea. Esta bebida goza de buena reputacion de los usuarios por su sabor del Sungnyung delicioso y fragante y  su alta eficacia medicinal.

articles.title: Entidad mexicana edita boletin por efemeride coreana
articles.content:
Entidad mexicana edita boletin por efemeride coreana
Pyongyang, 3 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 91o aniversario del nacimiento de la heroina de lucha antijaponesa Kim Jong Suk, el Comite Mexicano de Estudio del Kimilsunismo edito el boletin no. 15 junto con la imagen de ella.
					  El articulo insertado en el boletin subraya que la heroina fue ferviente revolucionaria quien lucho dedicando todo lo suyo por el partido y el lider, la liberacion de la patria y la victoria de la revolucion.
					
					  Prosigue que ella acumulo las hazanas indelebles en la historia materializando la gran idea revolucionaria del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el espiritu revolucionario del Paektu, que encarnaba en el maximo nivel.
					
					  Destaca que ella dio firme continuidad a la causa revolucionaria del Juche iniciada por el Presidente Kim Il Sung e hizo al pueblo coreano tener la maxima gloria y felicidad de contar con excelentes lideres de generacion en generacion al formar como el futuro Sol a Su Excelencia Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					  Apunta que por sus nobles rasgos ideo-espirituales y eternas proezas revolucionarias realizadas por la patria y el pueblo, ella esta presente de modo perenne en el corazon del pueblo coreano como guardia corps del Presidente Kim Il Sung, heroina de lucha antijaponesa, destacada politica y gran madre de la revolucion.
					
					  Finalmente, la publicacion asevera que su nombre brilla en la historia moderna de Corea como uno de los 3 Grandes Hombres, los 3 Generales.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun rechaza acto de Japon para hacerse miembro de CS
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun rechaza acto de Japon para hacerse miembro de CS
Pyongyang, 3 de diciembre (ATCC) -- En el debate del informe y el problema de reforma del Consejo de Seguridad en el pleno del 63o periodo de sesiones de la Asamblea General de la ONU, efectuado hace poco, Japon explico de manera verbosa la "legalidad" de su ingreso en el CS de la ONU actuando atrevidamente para ocupar la posicion responsable de la ONU.
					El diario Rodong Sinmun, en un comentario individual difundido en su edicion de este miercoles, lo califica de una imprudencia y continua:
					
					 Japon no tiene la calificacion de hablar del ingreso en el CS de la ONU, porque es el pais que cometio archi-crimenes anti-eticos en el pasado y que hasta la fecha no hace reflexion sincera ni indemnizacion merecida. 
					
					   Los que niegan y tergiversan la historia criminal no pueden hacer una nueva partida ni tener el futuro, sino repiten los crimenes del pasado. Tales fuerzas no pueden desempenar el papel responsable en la sociedad internacional. 
					
					   El proceder impudico e indiscreto de Japon, que, sin darse cuenta de su situacion ni de la tendencia mundial, intenta hacerse miembro permanente del CS de la ONU, hablando de alguna "legitimidad", deviene una burla e insulto a la justicia y la conciencia de la humanidad. 
					
					  El puesto del pais miembro permanente del CS de la ONU no lo pueden ocupar con el deseo ni comprarlo con el dinero. 
					
					  Antes de ambicionar atrevidamente el cargo responsable de la ONU, Japon debe liquidar sus crimenes del pasado, liberarse del pais enemigo y ganar la confianza internacional. Esto es la tarea inminente para la isla. 
					
					  Si no, no puede evadir la frialdad y el rechazo de la sociedad internacional ni realizar su sueno con el ingreso en el CS de la ONU.
